title: Estimate forest indicators — estimate_indicators
text: indicators character vector containing indicators estimated. stand_static_input data frame (sf object) containing static stand variables. Minimum required column id_stand (character). stand_dynamic_input Optional data frame containing dynamic stand variables. Minimum required columns id_stand (character) date (Date). plant_static_input Optional data frame containing static plant variables. Minimum required columns id_stand (character) plant_entity (character). plant_dynamic_input Optional data frame containing dynamic plant variables. Minimum required columns id_stand (character), plant_entity (character) date (Date). timber_volume_function Optional function supplied timber volume calculation. plant_biomass_function Optional function supplied whole-plant biomass calculation. additional_params Optional named list element turn list additional parameters required internal indicator functions. verbose logical flag provide information progress
